Package com.example.appointment.controller

Interface AddListenerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddAppointmentController, AddCustomerController, LoginController, ModifyAppointmentController, ModifyCustomerController
public interface AddListenerInterface
An interface that adds a listener to a passed in JavaFX object so that the label is displayed revealing an error message, and the JavaFX object will change to red, until a valid text entry is entered.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    addListenerToLabel(DatePicker datePicker, Label label)
    A method that makes a label visible that displays an error message depending on the values into a date picker.
    default void
    addListenerToLabel(Spinner<Integer> spinner, Label label)
    A method that makes a label visible that displays an error message depending on the values into a spinner.
    default void
    addListenerToLabel(TextField textField, Label label, String message)
    A method that makes a label visible that displays an error message if the text in a textfield is invalid.

  • Method Details

    • addListenerToLabel

      default void addListenerToLabel(TextField textField, Label label, String message)
      A method that makes a label visible that displays an error message if the text in a textfield is invalid. It also changes the color of the passed in textfield. This is to alert the user that the text that was typed in was invalid and that they need to try again. Lambda Expressions The lambda expression allows the listener to do the following if any text is entered after the method is ran:
      1. Make the label visible.
      2. Remove the style so the TextField is no longer red.
      Parameters:
      textField - Takes in a passed in TextField to check for valid text.
      label - Takes in a label to make visible if the text is invalid.
      message - Takes in text to set the label to. This is used to make it easier to use this method in different parts of the program.

    • addListenerToLabel

      default void addListenerToLabel(Spinner<Integer> spinner, Label label)
      A method that makes a label visible that displays an error message depending on the values into a spinner. It also changes the color of the spinner to red in order to alert the user. This is to display an error message if the values in the spinner are invalid. Lambda Expressions The lambda expression allows the listener to do the following if any text is entered after the method is ran:
      1. Make the label visible.
      2. Remove the style so the Spinner is no longer red.
      Parameters:
      spinner - Takes in a passed in Spinner to check for a valid entry
      label - Takes in a label to make visible if the text is invalid.

    • addListenerToLabel

      default void addListenerToLabel(DatePicker datePicker, Label label)
      A method that makes a label visible that displays an error message depending on the values into a date picker. It also changes the color of the date picker to red in order to alert the user. This is to display an error message if the values in the date picker are invalid. Lambda Expressions The lambda expression allows the listener to do the following if any text is entered after the method is ran:
      1. Make the label visible.
      2. Remove the style so the Date Picker is no longer red.
      Parameters:
      datePicker - Takes in a passed in date picker to check for a valid entry
      label - Takes in a label to make visible if the text is invalid.
